edu.ksu.cis.macr.simulator.roles.interpreter
Interface GoalCapabilityMap

All Known Implementing Classes:
GoalCapabilityMapImpl
public interface GoalCapabilityMap

The generic interface for a GoalCapabilityMap

Author:
Kyle Hill

Method Detail

addMapping

void addMapping(String goalName,
                Method method,
                Object capability)
Adds the given goalName -> capability entry mapping to the map.

Parameters:
goalName - the goal name (capability method name) key to add to the mapping
method - the method value to add to the mapping
capability - the capability instance value to add to the mapping

invoke

Object invoke(edu.ksu.cis.macr.organization.model.InstanceGoal<edu.ksu.cis.macr.goal.model.InstanceParameters> goal)
              throws NoSuchMethodException,
                     IllegalArgumentException,
                     IllegalAccessException,
                     InvocationTargetException
Invokes the given goal (capability method name) on the object that it maps to the goal in the GoalCapabilityMap with the goal's instance parameters.

Parameters:
goal - the capability to invoke
Returns:
the return value of the method
Throws:
NoSuchMethodException - if no method is mapped to the given goal
IllegalArgumentException - if the given goal's instance parameters do not match up with the formal parameters of the method that it maps to
IllegalAccessException - if the requested method cannot be invoked due to Java visibility restrictions
InvocationTargetException - if an exception is thrown or an assertion is hit while invoking the target method
